column5: Has anyone tried the sat phone rentals. Any good bad comments on service. I've heard the low end models drop after 5 minutes or so which is fine since this would be strictly an emergency use thing. Last year while gone we had a pipe rupture in sprinkler system at night and my wife freaked. Had she been able to call it would have saved a lot of money for a midnight service call. She could have justed turned a valve.john
I'm going to try one this year. Look at this site.http://www.satphonestore.com/rentals/
